title: What's mad to you? Part 1: Glimpses from psychiatrists
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Mental illness - Public opinion
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Psychiatry, Transcultural
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Psychotherapy patients
description: Episode of Series "Australian mosaic". The first in a two-part series, this program looks at the stigma associated with mental illness, particularly in relation to migrants who have different value systems. A number of psychologists and psychiatrists from a wide variety of ethnic backgrounds talk about the problems as they see it. The patient's point of view is also presented by a small group who talk about how they overcame their resistance to seeking psychiatric help.
